body_html:
That may be one issue and possibly a feature request for a QueueRunnerBase or for a more general thread runner. I haven't yet looked at what is involved with serialization so the check may be valid, in the case of my custom runner, particularly as it has not been tested in a distributed setting.

I'm open to suggestions for how to proceed and if a pull request is warranted I can put one together.

body:
That may be one issue and possibly a feature request for a `QueueRunnerBase` or for a more general thread runner. I haven't yet looked at what is involved with serialization so the check may be valid, in the case of my custom runner, particularly as it has not been tested in a distributed setting.

I'm open to suggestions for how to proceed and if a pull request is warranted I can put one together.
